divs: sighting detailswe were all standing by a fire we had just made. some of us were watching thesky because of the recent leonid meteor shower occuring. we then noticed a verybright object moving faster than the usual craft in we see. the ufo begane moveeraticaly in a zig zag motion. then continued in a north direction. the whitecolor went to a bright orange to a bright red then blinked and disappeared. thesky was clowdless and with high visibility. this lasted approx. 5min. thanks foryour help.\\\ experiment
